mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{userVO.user_id}, #{productVO.product_id}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, c.product_id, c.quantity, p.product_name, p.brand_name, p.option, p.price, (SELECT i.img_url FROM product_img i WHERE i.product_id = p.product_id LIMIT 1) AS img_url FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY c.user_id, c.product_id, c.quantity, p.product_name, p.brand_name, p.option, p.price;
